item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

Chassy13:

I don’t know why I still have my avatar, I resigned and it was still there after I got demoted. I PM’d Mitb awhile back asking about it, never got a response, so I’ve just kept it. It’s not a problem for me (except I can’t change it :()

item.title: Free MoparScape Server Giveaway!
item.dc:creator: @dain_bramage dain bramage
item.description:
@dain_bramage wrote:

Fucking hell.

You earn points and exchange those points for you again in a Wallie Card. You can earn points by: Clicks-to be received by people who click on your link-click -click missions: Go to the advertisers website for points -Surveys fill: Fill out a survey and get dozens of points! You can already buy a Wallie Card from 500 credits if you, you sign up now you get 10 points off balance!

Vote-for-click bullshit.

Read full topic
